function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Development of program focused on traditional medicines with local Shaman","Impact":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through traditional medicine practices","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene and sanitation protocols for traditional medicine practices","Technologies":"Hygiene and sanitation technology for disinfection and sterilization","People":"Local community, traditional medicine practitioners, and program participants","Owner":"Local community leaders and program organizers"},{"Description":"Waste Management Program generating revenues from plastic waste","Impact":"Potential risk of exposure to infectious materials during waste management process","Mitigation":"Provide training and personal protective equipment for waste management personnel","Technologies":"Waste management equipment for safe handling and disposal of infectious materials","People":"Waste management personnel, local community members","Owner":"Local authorities and waste management program organizers"},{"Description":"Diversification of revenue streams including F&B, SPA Treatments, and Transports","Impact":"Increase in potential human-to-human contact and exposure to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement health and safety protocols for F&B, SPA Treatments, and Transports","Technologies":"Health monitoring technology, sanitation and disinfection equipment","People":"Staff, guests, and service providers","Owner":"Management and operational staff"}]}
